text: Dan Olweus (April 18, 1931 - September 2020) was a Swedish-Norwegian psychologist. He was a research professor of psychology at the University of Bergen, Norway. Olweus was known as a pioneer of research on bullying. He was born in Nässjö, Sweden. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1990. Olweus died in September 2020 at the age of 89.Death of Dan Olweus ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Bergen Category:Norwegian scientists Category:Swedish psychologists Category:Norwegian psychologists Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Dan Olweus
